name: California State Preschool Program
description: Free part-day preschool for income-eligible families with children 3-5
fullDescription: The California State Preschool Program provides free, high-quality preschool education to income-eligible families, preparing children ages 3-5 for kindergarten success.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free part-day preschool
- For children ages 3-5
- High-quality early education
- Kindergarten readiness focus
- Available at multiple locations
- Includes meals and snacks
howToGetIt:
1. Check income eligibility requirements
2. Find participating preschool providers
3. Complete application process
4. Provide income documentation
5. Submit required paperwork
6. Enroll child once approved
